query:
SELECT 
  avt.id,
  avt.status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.created_at,
  ph.duration,
  ph.audio_url,
  ph.title as highlight_title
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
WHERE avt.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

  avt.error_message,
  avt.created_at,
  ph.duration,
  ph.audio_url,
  ph.title as highlight_title
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
WHERE avt.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
